Note: Instagram would open on the MR display but appeared as a blank opaque screen . User described it as looking like a screen protector.
The instagram app on the MR display did not open unless instagram was open on the phone.
Although Instagram needed to be open on the phon first before playing on the glasses,  it continues to play when closed.
User noticed that when the background was a more complex photo , the videos / reels as viewed in the glasses were distorted a bit. So he preferred to look at a more simple darker background.
